messages.title: A Record of Delivery
messages.content: Satnam Kaur Khalsa has a track record of delivering leaflets throughout Hayes and Harlington with a strong campaign team.

messages.title: A Promise of More
messages.content: Satnam has worked with the local community on a wide range of issues.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Provided tax cuts for struggling school kids, increased the tax free allowance to £10,600, and provided a £600 tax cut to low income workers.
Provided £400 to guarantee a mental health worker in every GP surgery and £3.5bn for books on the NHS.
Protected education by increasing spending by £8bn a year and reduced class sizes.
Balanced the books on time, reducing the deficit.

issues.economy: Satnam worked closely with Vince Cable to help local businesses, has delivered leaflets discussing the economy, and is focused on economic responsibility and providing a fair economy through fair taxes.
issues.education: Satnam is passionate about education and protecting it by increasing spending by £8bn a year, reducing class sizes.
issues.environment: Satnam has a solid record of campaigning on environmental issues.
issues.health: Satnam ensures the delivery of quality healthcare by providing £400 to guarantee a mental health worker in every GP surgery and £3.5bn for books on the NHS.

leaflet.personalStatement: Satnam has a passion to serve people of all ages and gender regardless of the background.

politicalExperience.achievements: Has extensive experience working with Vince Cable, delivering leaflets, and campaigning on a range of issues.

contactInformation.address: Return to Lib Dems, A. Vileiri Street, Uxbridge, UK, UB8 2PU

quotes.text: Satnam Kaur Khalsa is focused on a fair economy, quality healthcare, and education for everyone.

images.caption: Satnam Kaur Khalsa with campaign team.
